name: ShooTarget
description:
ShooTarget is a game when you do like shooting stand, shoot targets.
The goal is to hit targets the quickly as possible.
---------------------CONTROLS------------------------
Z or UpArrow = Move
Z or UpArrow + LeftShift = Running
S or DownArrow = Move Forward
Q or LeftArrow = Move Left
D or RightArrow = Move Right
LeftClick = Shooting
RightClick = Aimming
This game made by one person.
